overview: With more twists and turns than the German autobahn, Love and Loss follows the story of Lanie and Alex, an ex-cop involved in the shooting of Lanie's ex-lover. Replete with suspense, betrayal and unbridled passion, this couples-friendly, plot-driven feature is guaranteed to arouse the mind and body!
tagline: Loss brought them together... love could tear them apart.
title: Love and Loss
